Tests¶

Unit Tests¶

Unit tests can be run using pytest.

source venv/bin/activate
pytest

Here is the list of unit tests by application.

Lettings¶

lettings.tests.tests_models.test_address_str()

GIVEN an Address object

WHEN using the str function on the address

THEN the __str__ format is returned

lettings.tests.tests_models.test_letting_str()

GIVEN a Letting object

WHEN using the str function on the letting

THEN the __str__ format is returned

lettings.tests.tests_urls.test_lettings_details_url()

GIVEN a letting_id

WHEN accessing the url /lettings/letting_id/

THEN the view lettings:letting is called

lettings.tests.tests_urls.test_lettings_index_url()

GIVEN

WHEN accessing the url /lettings/

THEN the view lettings:index is called

lettings.tests.tests_views.test_lettings_details_view()

GIVEN a letting

WHEN accessing lettings/letting_id

THEN the template letting/letting.html is displayed

and the letting data are displayed

lettings.tests.tests_views.test_lettings_index_view()

GIVEN a letting

WHEN accessing lettings/

THEN the template letting/index.html is displayed

and the lettings list is displayed

Profiles¶

profiles.tests.tests_models.test_profile_str()

GIVEN a Profile object

WHEN using the str function on the profile

THEN the __str__ format is returned

profiles.tests.tests_urls.test_profile_details_url()

GIVEN a username

WHEN accessing the url /profiles/username/

THEN the view letting is called

profiles.tests.tests_urls.test_profiles_index_url()

GIVEN

WHEN accessing the url /profiles/

THEN the view profiles:index is called

profiles.tests.tests_views.test_lettings_details_view()

GIVEN a username

WHEN accessing the url /profiles/username/

THEN the template profiles/profile.html is displayed

and the profile data are displayed

profiles.tests.tests_views.test_profiles_index_view()

GIVEN a profile

WHEN accessing the url /profiles/

THEN the template profiles/index.html is displayed

and the profiles list is displayed

OC Lettings Site¶

oc_lettings_site.tests.tests_urls.test_oc_lettings_site_index_url()

GIVEN

WHEN accessing the url /

THEN the view index is called

oc_lettings_site.tests.tests_views.test_oc_lettings_site_index_view()

GIVEN

WHEN accessing the url /

THEN the template index.html is displayed

and the site home page is displayed

Functional Tests¶

Functional tests can be launched using pytest and selenium:

source venv/bin/activate
pytest ./oc_lettings_site/tests/functional_test.py

Below are the functional tests :

class oc_lettings_site.tests.functional_test.OCLettingsSite(methodName='runTest')
test_lettings_path()

Tests the following path :

  • homepage

  • lettings list

  • letting details

  • back button

test_page_404()

Tests the following path :

  • homepage

  • wrong url

test_page_500()

Tests the following path :

  • homepage

  • wrong lettings page index

test_profiles_path()

Tests the following path :

  • homepage

  • profiles list

  • profile details

  • back button
